revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMC7004ABR |revision=(7502.5702, 720.5432) |upc=662698570106 |asin=B00005NBR6 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Accton |manuf_model=RG0005 |manuf_rev=2-17 |availability=EoL |est_release_date=2001 |type=router |fcc_id= |pcb_id=142000500100A |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Conexant |cpu1_model=CX82100-11;CONEXANT, CX82100-11, E113771.1, 0101 PHILLIPINES, ARM; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=1 MiB |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model= |ram1=8 MiB |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16100-7T |expansion_if_types=Parallel |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, console,, RS-232 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Kendin |eth_chip2_model=KS8737;KS8737, 0131A4-F43777.1; |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E8050;88E8050-RJJ, T04993.12, 0050 ATP; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=RS-232 Transciever;Sipex;SP3243;SIPEX, SP3243ECA, 0112;1; ,,, DC/DC Switching Regulator;ADD Microtech Corp.;AMC34063A;0133, AMC34063AM;1; ,,, Super I/O Chip;SMSC;SP37E760-MD;SMSC, SP37E760-MD, A0130-A950, 8H105502;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth= }}
"P/N: 142000500100A REV: 01" is silkscreened on one sample SMC7004ABR's board. :A date code of '''0128''' is also etched onto the bottom of the board. An ''[[Accton]]'' label affixed to the board indicates the internal model of this :device was ''RG0005 2-17'', which is corroborated by the silkscreened P/N
*SMC Part No. 750.5702, Sub-Assy No. 720.5432
*[http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/ Noted on the '''HRI''' hardware table]
